DataElement.preferredName: Periapical Radiograph Diagnostic Imaging Root Fracture Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the presence of root fracture on the radiographic film at or around the apex of the root of a tooth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Periapical Radiograph Diagnostic Imaging Root Fracture Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the presence of root fracture on the radiographic film at or around the apex of the root of a tooth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: At or around the apex of the root of a tooth.:An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.:Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: At or around the apex of the root of a tooth.
An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:A traumatic injury to the bone in which the continuity of the bone is broken. - 2003:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The part of a tooth below the neck of the tooth which is covered by cementum.
A traumatic injury to the bone in which the continuity of the bone is broken.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
